I am updating the current pose of the machine using mt1

螢幕擷取畫面 2025-03-29 2329361507×770 48.4 KB

Control the robot to a specified pose but the machine will be crooked at the last position. I have tried to adjust the rot pid but the effect is not good. Is there any way to solve this problem?

Are you sure the controller is the appropriate one for your use case? The documentation says it is to follow a trajectory and I don’t see that you have a high resolution one. You try to jump from where you are to the end in one step essentially.

The holonomic drive controller is a trajectory tracker for robots with holonomic drivetrains (e.g. swerve, mecanum, etc.). This can be used to accurately track trajectories with correction for minor disturbances.
